attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis possession and growing for personal use.
attributes.additional_details:
Alcohol and cigarettes are legal, cannabis isn't. 
According to statistics alcohol or cigarettes cause more damage to your body than cannabis. Yet, cannabis is considered as a narcotic. Alcohol ruins families, yet it is legal.
The government should also consider positive impact on economy. Growing and Selling in authorised shops = tax as well as new jobs therefore decrease in the unemployment rate. It would also attract more tourists. Also, NHS might see less deaths and crime related to alcohol.
attributes.background: It should be the publics decision. Let's vote just like we were voting for Brexit.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Hold a national referendum on legalising and decriminalising cannabis.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616910
